item.title: School of Science Arch Field Trip: Yale Peabody Museum of Natural History | June 22
item.description: Date: Sunday, June 22, 2025 6:00 AM - 7:30 PM - RESCHEDULED TO SUNDAY, JUNE 22 ALL MAJORS WELCOME! Students will have the opportunity to engage with exhibits showcasing dinosaur fossils, ancient artifacts, minerals, and cultural treasures from around the world. Free breakfast and lunch will be provided. Meet at RPI Union horseshoe entrance at 6:00 AM, bus departure at 6:30 AM. Bus will return to RPI by 7:30 PM. Sign-up ends 4 PM on June 20.

item.title: Prep Session for the Capital Region Careers Networking Night | June 18
item.description: Are you planning to attend the Capital Region Careers Networking Night or other networking events in the future? Come to this workshop in the CCPD Office onJune 18 from 12-1 PM to learn more about how to interact with employers, recruiters, and other professionals at events. Register in Handshake!

item.title: Outdoor Professional Headshots with the CCPD | June 18
item.description: Are you a student looking to update your professional profile or need a fresh headshot? Join the CCPD for outdoor headshot session on Wednesday, June 18th 2025 between 1 - 2PM! Don’t miss this opportunity to get a polished, professional photo taken in a beautiful outdoor setting.

item.title: Science (Fiction) in the Capital | June 19
item.description: Date: Thursday, June 19, 2025 7:30 AM - 9:00 AM - Capitalists and tech broligarchs want to own the future. How does science fiction offer visions of a more just world, one built by humans’ innate faculty for creativity and creation? Join Dr. Mitch R. Murray (Communication and Media) for a public lecture on sci fi at Siena College (226 Roger Bacon Hall at 7:30 PM).

item.title: LGBTQ+ Trivia | June 17
item.description: Date: Tuesday, June 17, 2025 4:00 PM - 6:00 PM - Join us for LGBTQ+ Trivia Night — a fun, fast-paced evening to test your knowledge of queer culture, history, icons, and milestones! Compete solo or with a team, win fun prizes, and learn something new while celebrating Pride Month in a welcoming, inclusive space.

item.title: Center of Gravity Summer 25 - Get Pulled In!
item.description:
Center of Gravity returns Wednesdays 3–10 pm as a one-stop for summer success: TA Office Hours (3–8 pm), Food service (until 8pm), CCPD workshops (4–6 pm), RecWell activities (4–6 pm), Mental Floss (6–7 pm), study spaces (4–10 pm), Peer Tutoring (7–9 pm), Sunset & Snacks (8–9 pm). Weekly activities include chair massages, therapy dogs, time-management workshops, away-semester prep, art therapy, book giveaways, networking nights, and more. Visit https://success.studentlife.rpi.edu/cog
